mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_teacher( name, code, content, img, state, create_by, sort, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{content}, #{img}, #{state}, #{createBy.id}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
